title: Scope Bindings
description: A document that defines the bindings for resource parameters, configuration files and any custom payloads files for extensions. It is required to use the Parameterization feature and otherwise optional.

scopeBindings.description: The list of scope binding definitions.

scopeTagName.description: The unique tag name tied to a service resource group or a service resource.

bindings.description: The list of bindings related to a service resource group or a service resource.

replaceWith.description: The value to replace the placeholder.
